    SmartCash 2.0

    Term Rewards

    A totally new concept of rewards for those that are long term holders. Many are already, but now you can lock your address directly in the blockchain from your private key to your private key and earn a minimum of 60% every year.

    What is new on SmartCash in 2021?

    "Bee" your own bank

    More Services

    Smart Rewards

    Are you starting to invest now in crypto but still does not have a lot of coins? Smart Rewards is for all. You only need 1000 SMART to start receiving weekly rewards. So, activate your address, and enjoy the gains.

    Smart Super Rewards

    Do you already have ~1 million SMART and don't like trading? Just activate your address and welcome to the wealth club.

    Smart Terms Rewards

    Already receiving Super Rewards but has a strong hand and don't care about waiting for a minimum of one year with your funds locked? So your income can be much better than it already is, receiving a minimum of 60% every year.

    Smart Compound Yield

    Much more than a cup of Coffee, both your Smart Rewards and Super Rewards receive compound yield.

    Smart Hub

    Smart Hub is our new platform that is well connected to our decentralized API called SAPI. No blockchain sync. No central server! Zero Costs!

    Busy bee

    Wanna contribute w/ and get some coins as payments? Busy bee is our first version of a task portal where we can reward people by done tasks.

    About SmartCash

    Get Started With SmartCash

    SmartCash is merchant focused, blockchain-based currency and part of a new decentralized economy.

    SmartHive is the part of the block reward designed to fund new software developments for web and core, support, and outreach.

    SmartRewards is the part of the block reward designed to reward holders that still does not have more than one million coins.

    SmartSuperRewards is the part of the block reward designed to reward holders that already have more than one million coins.

    SmartNodes is responsible for making sure you can be a part of a decentralized network. Their only goal is to help the networks and transactions. It does prevent a double-spending attack as well. On the other hand, if you have an active node, our blockchain pays you a reward.

    InstantPay is a mechanism that uses SmartNodes in the background to make transactions in milliseconds. In other words, you don't need to wait more than 1 second to have your crypto transaction confirmed in the blockchain. FYI, BTC takes 10 minutes minimum.

    Why Choose Us

    Acutually Why We Are
    & Who We Are.

    Learn More

    SmartRewards

    is the part of the block reward designed to reward holders that still does not have more than one million coins.

    Smart Super Rewards

    is the part of the block reward designed to reward holders that already have more than one million coins.

    Smart Terms Rewards

    Is a part of the community budget allocated to reward in locked payments those who are willing to lock their addresses per 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5 years and already a Smart Super Reward holder.

    SmartHub

    Smart Hub is our new platform that is well connected to our decentralized API called SAPI. No blockchain sync. No central server! Zero Costs!

    Send Smart by Email/Link/SMS

    User can send SMART via Email, link or SMS.

    SmartHive

    SmartHive is the system designed to distribute and allocate budgets to work in parallel to develop more products and correctly announce them.

    SmartNodes

    SmartNodes are servers that run a SmartCash wallet in order to provide noncentral systems, reducing costs, and hosting APIs where we can build online systems over it. Meanwhile, it is fully responsible for locking a transaction and providing what we call Instant Pay. That means your transaction takes only milliseconds to arrive in another wallet.

    Electrum Wallet

    Electrum’s focus is speed and simplicity, with low resource usage. It uses remote servers that handle the most complicated parts of the SmartCash system, and it allows you to recover your wallet from a secret phrase.

    InstantPay

    (Instant Transactions): Allows for SmartCash transactions to be locked in about a second. Used mostly for merchants and SmartCard. No risk of double spending a transaction, so the receiver can trust that transaction immediately.

    Multisig

    Multisignature (multisig) refers to requiring more than one key to authorize a SmartCash transaction. It is generally used to divide up responsibility for possession of SmartCash.
